awards.text: Won 1 BAFTA Film Award. Another 1 win & 3 nominations.

fullplot: In his Scottish New Town home, gangling Gregory and his school-friends are starting to find out about girls. He fancies Dorothy, not least because she has got into the football team - and is a better player than him. He finally asks her out, but it is obviously the females in control of matters here, and that very much includes Gregory's younger sister.
plot: Gregory is a normal teen who is infatuated with a classmate. He must work to win her affection.
title: Gregory's Girl
